original_text: Thus shalt thou say unto him, The Lord saith thus; Behold, that which I have built will I break down, and that which I have planted I will pluck up, even this whole land.
korean_text: 너는 그에게 이르라 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 보라 나는 내가 세운 것을 헐기도 하며 내가 심은 것을 뽑기도 하나니 온 땅에 그리하겠거늘

sentences.original_text: Thus shalt thou say unto him,
that which I have built will I break down,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 세운 것을 내가 헐 것이며

sentences.original_text: and that which I have planted I will pluck up,
